alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Chester; Decatur; Henderson; Henry; Madison; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 18 at 2:46AM CDT until October 19 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Early this morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 degrees expected. For tonight`s Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 degrees expected. * WHERE...Weakley, Henry, Carroll, Benton TN, Madison, Chester, Henderson and Decatur Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM CDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Chester; Decatur; Henderson; Henry; Madison; Weakley
